[ library(gap) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

gap_query_string(++Format, +Args, ?Result)

Query GAP
Format
Format string
Args
List of arguments
Result
Result (string)

Description

Evaluates an expression in GAP and returns the result as a string. The expression is specified using Format and Args a la printf/2, and should be a valid GAP expression (no terminating semicolon). The result is returned as a string in Result.

If there is no currently active GAP session, one is started before sending the query.

See Also

gap_query / 3, gap_command / 2, printf / 2
